cantrips.name: Vicious Mockery
cantrips.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range.

cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range.

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature you can see within range.

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation
cantrips.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice.

cantrips.name: Thaumaturgy
cantrips.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power.

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range.

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice.

spells_level_1.name: Cure Wounds
spells_level_1.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

spells_level_1.name: Mage Armor
spells_level_1.description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it.

spells_level_1.name: Shield
spells_level_1.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

spells_level_1.name: Healing Word
spells_level_1.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points.

spells_level_1.name: Detect Magic
spells_level_1.description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

spells_level_1.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
spells_level_1.description: A creature of your choice that you can see perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter.

spells_level_1.name: Shield of Faith
spells_level_1.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice, granting +2 AC.

spells_level_1.name: Feather Fall
spells_level_1.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature’s rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round.

spells_level_2.name: Hold Person
spells_level_2.description: Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed.

spells_level_2.name: Shatter
spells_level_2.description: A sudden loud ringing noise painfully intense erupts from a point of your choice.

spells_level_2.name: Lesser Restoration
spells_level_2.description: You touch a creature and can end one disease or condition afflicting it.

spells_level_2.name: Misty Step
spells_level_2.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

spells_level_2.name: Calm Emotions
spells_level_2.description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people.

spells_level_2.name: Invisibility
spells_level_2.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

spells_level_2.name: Enhance Ability
spells_level_2.description: You touch a creature and bestow magical enhancement.

spells_level_2.name: Mirror Image
spells_level_2.description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.
